title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2813.1 - Notice of funding availability (NOFA)
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2813.1 - Notice of funding availability (NOFA)

State Regulations

As funds are made available for the purpose of this
program, the division shall publish in the State Register notice of the
availability of funds, and procedures for obtaining and submitting
applicants. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
2813.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
